thread.title: When Kishore fought Iron Man and Spider-Man
thread.title_full: When Kishore fought Iron Man and Spider-Man - The Times of India

author: Prathibha Joy
title: When Kishore fought Iron Man and Spider-Man
text:
In a tale about the issues in the Indian education system, one would wonder what the relevance of superheroes like Iron Man, Superman, Batman or Spider-Man could be. But director Madhu Chandra of Vascodigama assures us that there is. In fact, the filmmaker says that the comic fight sequence's theme is that an Indian superhero — Hanuman — is the inspiration for all other superheroes.
The sequence, for which lead actor Kishore had to learn a few martial arts techniques, was shot over a week against a green screen backdrop that was later filled in with graphics. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
